definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
numerous and confused/forming a confused mass

sentences.english: The clay is very stiff; we must make it thinner with water.
sentences.chinese: 這粘土非常稠，我們須用水使它變得稀一些。

sentences.english: Must prepare at least 200 cubic meter's slurry before spud.
sentences.chinese: 開鑽前應配好至少200方高粘度稠泥漿。

sentences.english: But in fact it wasn’t big. It was dense.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上藥丸不很大卻很稠。

sentences.english: Urethral opening with or thin or thick purulent.
sentences.chinese: 尿道口有或稀或稠的膿性分泌物。

sentences.english: The soup will reduce by adding some cooking starch.
It will be super thick and very delicious.
The dense extract and lactose were mixed fully, then granulate after vacuum drying.
sentences.chinese: 制粒方法爲地黃稠浸膏與乳糖混勻，真空乾燥後製粒。

sentences.english: Finally, the application of thermothicking hydrogel is prospected in the oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 同時展望了熱增稠凝膠在油田開發中的應用。

sentences.english: A medium added to thick printing ink to make it thinner and suitable for printing.
sentences.chinese: 加入濃及稠的油墨內，使它稀化，適合印刷的媒介物。

sentences.english: This study provides theoretic basis for the multiple utilization and developments of Prunus padus Linn.
sentences.chinese: 本研究結果爲稠李的綜合開發利用提供理論依據。

sentences.english: Turn to low heat and cook the ribs until tender and sauce thickened, dish up and serve.
sentences.chinese: 轉最小火燜至肋排腍而汁料收稠便可上碟。

sentences.english: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat.
sentences.chinese: 燒開，邊煮邊攪拌2分鐘或湯汁變濃稠，關小火。

definition: to scrape a meager living/to get by with difficulty
sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
(of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
Gorgon plant/fox nut (Gorgon euryale or Euryale ferox)/makhana (Hindi)
